week.theme: SEVENTH WIN & FIRST CLEANSHEET EVER! Milestone Victory!

training.location: Mobilio West (Town Centre Park) - Grid D
training.focus: Celebrate milestone, maintain momentum, prepare for home game
training.notes: Wednesday training this week - preparing for Saturday's HOME match vs PCFC Sonics

match.preparation_focus: HOME game vs PCFC Sonics! Coming off our historic 7th win and FIRST CLEANSHEET EVER. Travis C on fire with back-to-back braces. Team showing incredible depth and character. Let's make it EIGHT wins!

highlights: Owen H beautiful assist for 1st goal
Henry K assist for 2nd goal - was everywhere
Ethan G clean sheet 1st half with nice saves
Rhodri W clean sheet 2nd half with nice saves
Niko D played entire game - recovered countless balls
Incredible counter attack: Owen, Minh-An, Travis, Andy quick passes
Big games from Minh-An, Andy, Travis, Owen, Henry
Showed depth despite missing David, Rafael, Adam (injured)

captains.duties: Lead warm-ups • Take set pieces • Guide positions • Motivate teammates
captains.training_update: Captains will be announced before the match

goalkeepers.duties: One GK in goal per 30-minute half • Non-GK plays field • Switch at half-time
goalkeepers.rotation_note: Continuing fair rotation across the squad

sideline_layout.keeper_spot: Near coach for quick switch at half

captains.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)

goalkeepers.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)
Dec 6 vs RMSC U11B10D3 Blue Lightning (FOURTH WIN!)
Jan 24 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SIXTH WIN!)
Jan 31 vs RMSC Johnson (SEVENTH WIN! FIRST CLEANSHEET!)

notes.arrival: Arrive by 11:45 AM (30 min early for warm-up)
notes.coach: HISTORIC WIN! Our SEVENTH WIN and FIRST CLEANSHEET EVER! Travis C scored both goals with beautiful assists from Owen H and Henry K. Ethan G and Rhodri W both kept clean sheets in their halves. Niko D played the entire game due to player shortages and was immense - recovering countless balls. The counter attack from Owen, Minh-An, Travis and Andy showed incredible quick-passing teamwork. Henry K was everywhere maintaining possession. A milestone to celebrate considering how the season started!
notes.match_update: NEXT MATCH: Saturday Feb 7 at 12:15pm vs PCFC Sonics at Percy Perry Stadium South (HOME).
notes.this_week: Training Wednesday, Match Saturday (HOME). Let's make it EIGHT wins!
achievements: Sept 13 vs Millwall: Score First Goal and Team Work Goal
Sept 20 vs PCFC Wolf Pack: Excellent second half comeback
Sept 27 vs Swansea: Andy E first goal! Travis C 2 goals (beautiful free kick!)
Oct 4 vs Tones: Best defensive performance! Yejun K and David C standout games
Oct 18 vs Soccer Stars: Dominated possession 25 min (1st half) + 15 min (2nd half)
Oct 25: FIRST WIN! 4-2 victory with Adam K hat-trick & Ethan G goal
Nov 8: Andy E beautiful finish vs PCFC Thunder (Travis C assist)
Nov 15: SECOND WIN! 4-2 vs Sheffield United - Niko D penalty, Adam K brace, Travis C goal
Nov 22: THIRD WIN! 5-2 vs Middlesbrough - Travis C x2, Rafael H first goal, Ethan G, Andy E
Dec 6: FOURTH WIN! 6-2 vs Blue Lightning - Travis C hat-trick, Owen H first TWO goals!
Jan 10: Solid 2-2 draw vs Geary - Adam K brace, led twice
Jan 17: FIFTH WIN! 3-1 vs PCFC Thunder (AWAY) - Payback! Minh-An D, Ethan G x2, Rafael H 3 assists
Jan 24: SIXTH WIN! 2-1 vs Sheffield United (HOME) - COMEBACK! Travis C brace, great character
Jan 31: SEVENTH WIN! FIRST CLEANSHEET! 2-0 vs RMSC Johnson - Travis C brace, Ethan & Rhodri cleansheets
